titles.title: Supporting the use of child safety seat occupancy identification programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Telecommunications, Trade, and Consumer Protection.

bill.summary: 7/27/2000--Introduced. Urges State and local governments, as well as parents, schools, institutions involved in providing child care, to use the `We Have A Little Emergency' (WHALE) child safety seat occupancy identification program to provide identification and essential medical information for children in the event of an automobile accident.
